text:
Champions League
Liverpool - Genk: what time and on which channel?
Liverpool receives Genk, as part of the 4th Champions League. A meeting broadcast live on French television. On which channel and at what time? Answer in this article
05 Nov 2019, 05:45 by Charlie Creteur



On the last day of the Champions League, the Reds had moved to Genk's Luminus Arena for a 1-4 victory. Oxalde-Chamberlain had scored twice (2nd, 57th) before the achievements of Sadio Man√© (77th) and Mohamed Salah (87th). For this 4th day, the second confrontation between Liverpool and Genk will take place in Anfield. Players J√ºrgen Klopp currently occupy the position of dolphin in group E while Belgians are in last place with only 1 point.








The classification of group E




J√ºrgen Klopp + 13 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport


Naples - 7 pts
Liverpool - 6 pts
RB Salzburg - 3 pts
Racing Genk - 1 pt




The calendar of group E




Paul Onuachu + 13 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

1st day - September 17th

RB Salzburg 6-2 Racing Genk
Naples 2-0 Liverpool

2nd day - October 2nd

Liverpool 4-3 RB Salzburg
Racing Genk 0-0 Naples

3rd day - 23rd of October

9 pm: RB Salzburg 2-3 Naples
9 pm: Racing Genk 1-4 Liverpool

4th day - November 5th

9 pm: Liverpool - Racing Genk
9 pm: Naples - RB Salzburg

5th day - 27th November

9 pm: Liverpool - Naples
21 hours: Racing Genk - RB Salzburg

6th day - December 10th

18:55 Naples - Racing Genk
18h55: RB Salzburg - Liverpool

Mohamed Salah + 13 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The match of the fourth day of the Champions League between Liverpool and Genk is broadcast live on French television on Tuesday 05 November 2019, from 21:00 French time on the RMC Sport live 7 channel.
